verses.verse: And Abimelech <WH40> the son <WH1121> of Yeruba`al <WH3378> went <WH3212> <WH8799> to SH'khem <WH7927> unto his mother's <WH517> brethren <WH251>, and communed <WH1696> <WH8762> with them, and with all the family <WH4940> of the house <WH1004> of his mother's <WH517> father <WH1>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Speak <WH1696> <WH8761>, I pray you, in the ears <WH241> of all the men <WH1167> of SH'khem <WH7927>, Whether is better <WH2896> for you, either that all the sons <WH1121> of Yeruba`al <WH3378>, which are threescore and ten <WH7657> persons <WH376>, reign <WH4910> <WH8800> over you, or that one <WH259> reign <WH4910> <WH8800> over you? remember <WH2142> <WH8804> also that I am your bone <WH6106> and your flesh <WH1320>.

And his mother's <WH517> brethren <WH251> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> of him in the ears <WH241> of all the men <WH1167> of SH'khem <WH7927> all these words <WH1697>: and their hearts <WH3820> inclined <WH5186> <WH8799> to follow <WH310> Abimelech <WH40>; for they said <WH559> <WH8804>, He is our brother <WH251>.

And they gave <WH5414> <WH8799> him threescore and ten <WH7657> pieces of silver <WH3701> out of the house <WH1004> of Baalberith <WH1170>, wherewith Abimelech <WH40> hired <WH7936> <WH8799> vain <WH7386> and light <WH6348> <WH8802> persons <WH582>, which followed <WH3212> <WH8799> him <WH310>.

And he went <WH935> <WH8799> unto his father's <WH1> house <WH1004> at Ophrah <WH6084>, and slew <WH2026> <WH8799> his brethren <WH251> the sons <WH1121> of Yeruba`al <WH3378>, being threescore and ten <WH7657> persons <WH376>, upon one <WH259> stone <WH68>: notwithstanding yet Yotam <WH3147> the youngest <WH6996> son <WH1121> of Yeruba`al <WH3378> was left <WH3498> <WH8735>; for he hid <WH2244> <WH8738> himself.

And all the men <WH1167> of SH'khem <WH7927> gathered together <WH622> <WH8735>, and all the house <WH1004> of Millo <WH4407> <WH8677> <WH1037>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799>, and made <WH4427> <WH8686> Abimelech <WH40> king <WH4428>, by the plain <WH436> of the pillar <WH5324> <WH8716> that was in SH'khem <WH7927>.

And when they told <WH5046> <WH8686> it to Yotam <WH3147>, he went <WH3212> <WH8799> and stood <WH5975> <WH8799> in the top <WH7218> of mount <WH2022> Gerizim <WH1630>, and lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> his voice <WH6963>, and cried <WH7121> <WH8799>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Hearken <WH8085> <WH8798> unto me, ye men <WH1167> of SH'khem <WH7927>, that 'Elohim <WH430> may hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> unto you.

The trees <WH6086> went forth <WH1980> <WH8804> <WH8676> <WH1980> <WH8800> on a time to anoint <WH4886> <WH8800> a king <WH4428> over them; and they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the olive tree <WH2132>, Reign <WH4427> <WH8798> thou over us.

But the olive tree <WH2132> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Should I leave <WH2308> <WH8804> my fatness <WH1880>, wherewith by me they honour <WH3513> <WH8762> 'Elohim <WH430> and man <WH582>, and go <WH1980> <WH8804> to be promoted <WH5128> <WH8800> over the trees <WH6086> ?
And the trees <WH6086> said <WH559> <WH8799> to the fig tree <WH8384>, Come <WH3212> <WH8798> thou, and reign <WH4427> <WH8798> over us.

But the fig tree <WH8384> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Should I forsake <WH2308> <WH8804> my sweetness <WH4987>, and my good <WH2896> fruit <WH8570>, and go <WH1980> <WH8804> to be promoted <WH5128> <WH8800> over the trees <WH6086> ?
Then said <WH559> <WH8799> the trees <WH6086> unto the vine <WH1612>, Come <WH3212> <WH8798> thou, and reign <WH4427> <WH8798> over us.

And the vine <WH1612> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Should I leave <WH2308> <WH8804> my wine <WH8492>, which cheereth <WH8055> <WH8764> 'Elohim <WH430> and man <WH582>, and go <WH1980> <WH8804> to be promoted <WH5128> <WH8800> over the trees <WH6086> ?
Then said <WH559> <WH8799> all the trees <WH6086> unto the bramble <WH329>, Come <WH3212> <WH8798> thou, and reign <WH4427> <WH8798> over us.

And the bramble <WH329> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the trees <WH6086>, If in truth <WH571> ye anoint <WH4886> <WH8802> me king <WH4428> over you, then come <WH935> <WH8798> and put your trust <WH2620> <WH8798> in my shadow <WH6738>: and if not, let fire <WH784> come out <WH3318> <WH8799> of the bramble <WH329>, and devour <WH398> <WH8799> the cedars <WH730> of Lebanon <WH3844>.

Now therefore, if ye have done <WH6213> <WH8804> truly <WH571> and sincerely <WH8549>, in that ye have made Abimelech <WH40> king <WH4427> <WH8686>, and if ye have dealt <WH6213> <WH8804> well <WH2896> with Yeruba`al <WH3378> and his house <WH1004>, and have done <WH6213> <WH8804> unto him according to the deserving <WH1576> of his hands <WH3027>;

(For my father <WH1> fought <WH3898> <WH8738> for you, and adventured <WH7993> <WH8686> his life <WH5315> far <WH5048>, and delivered <WH5337> <WH8686> you out of the hand <WH3027> of Midian <WH4080>:

And ye are risen up <WH6965> <WH8804> against my father's <WH1> house <WH1004> this day <WH3117>, and have slain <WH2026> <WH8799> his sons <WH1121>, threescore and ten <WH7657> persons <WH376>, upon one <WH259> stone <WH68>, and have made Abimelech <WH40>, the son <WH1121> of his maidservant <WH519>, king <WH4427> <WH8686> over the men <WH1167> of SH'khem <WH7927>, because he is your brother <WH251>;)

If ye then have dealt <WH6213> <WH8804> truly <WH571> and sincerely <WH8549> with Yeruba`al <WH3378> and with his house <WH1004> this day <WH3117>, then rejoice <WH8055> <WH8798> ye in Abimelech <WH40>, and let him also rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> in you:

But if not, let fire <WH784> come out <WH3318> <WH8799> from Abimelech <WH40>, and devour <WH398> <WH8799> the men <WH1167> of SH'khem <WH7927>, and the house <WH1004> of Millo <WH4407> <WH8677> <WH1037>; and let fire <WH784> come out <WH3318> <WH8799> from the men <WH1167> of SH'khem <WH7927>, and from the house <WH1004> of Millo <WH4407> <WH8676> <WH1037>, and devour <WH398> <WH8799> Abimelech <WH40>.

And Yotam <WH3147> ran away <WH1272> <WH8799>, and fled <WH5127> <WH8799>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> to Beer <WH876>, and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> there, for fear <WH6440> of Abimelech <WH40> his brother <WH251>.
When Abimelech <WH40> had reigned <WH7786> <WH8799> three <WH7969> years <WH8141> over Yisra'EL <WH3478>,

Then 'Elohim <WH430> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> an evil <WH7451> spirit <WH7307> between Abimelech <WH40> and the men <WH1167> of SH'khem <WH7927>; and the men <WH1167> of SH'khem <WH7927> dealt treacherously <WH898> <WH8799> with Abimelech <WH40>:

That the cruelty <WH2555> done to the threescore and ten <WH7657> sons <WH1121> of Yeruba`al <WH3378> might come <WH935> <WH8800>, and their blood <WH1818> be laid <WH7760> <WH8800> upon Abimelech <WH40> their brother <WH251>, which slew <WH2026> <WH8804> them; and upon the men <WH1167> of SH'khem <WH7927>, which aided <WH2388> <WH8765> <WH3027> him in the killing <WH2026> <WH8800> of his brethren <WH251>.

And the men <WH1167> of SH'khem <WH7927> set <WH7760> <WH8799> liers in wait <WH693> <WH8764> for him in the top <WH7218> of the mountains <WH2022>, and they robbed <WH1497> <WH8799> all that came <WH5674> <WH8799> along that way <WH1870> by them: and it was told <WH5046> <WH8714> Abimelech <WH40>.

And Gaal <WH1603> the son <WH1121> of Ebed <WH5651> came <WH935> <WH8799> with his brethren <WH251>, and went over <WH5674> <WH8799> to SH'khem <WH7927>: and the men <WH1167> of SH'khem <WH7927> put their confidence <WH982> <WH8799> in him.

And they went out <WH3318> <WH8799> into the fields <WH7704>, and gathered <WH1219> <WH8799> their vineyards <WH3754>, and trode <WH1869> <WH8799> the grapes, and made <WH6213> <WH8799> merry <WH1974>, and went <WH935> <WH8799> into the house <WH1004> of their god <WH430>, and did eat <WH398> <WH8799> and drink <WH8354> <WH8799>, and cursed <WH7043> <WH8762> Abimelech <WH40>.

And Gaal <WH1603> the son <WH1121> of Ebed <WH5651> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Who is Abimelech <WH40>, and who is SH'khem <WH7927>, that we should serve <WH5647> <WH8799> him? is not he the son <WH1121> of Yeruba`al <WH3378>? and Zebul <WH2083> his officer <WH6496>? serve <WH5647> <WH8798> the men <WH582> of Hamor <WH2544> the father <WH1> of SH'khem <WH7927>: for why should we serve <WH5647> <WH8799> him?

And would to 'Elohim this people <WH5971> were under <WH5414> <WH8799> my hand <WH3027> ! then would I remove <WH5493> <WH8686> Abimelech <WH40>. And he said <WH559> <WH8799> to Abimelech <WH40>, Increase <WH7235> <WH8761> thine army <WH6635>, and come out <WH3318> <WH8798>.

And when Zebul <WH2083> the ruler <WH8269> of the city <WH5892> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> the words <WH1697> of Gaal <WH1603> the son <WH1121> of Ebed <WH5651>, his anger <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> <WH8799>.

And he sent <WH7971> <WH8799> messengers <WH4397> unto Abimelech <WH40> privily <WH8649>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Behold, Gaal <WH1603> the son <WH1121> of Ebed <WH5651> and his brethren <WH251> be come <WH935> <WH8802> to SH'khem <WH7927>; and, behold, they fortify <WH6696> <WH8802> the city <WH5892> against thee.
Now therefore up <WH6965> <WH8798> by night <WH3915>, thou and the people <WH5971> that is with thee, and lie in wait <WH693> <WH8798> in the field <WH7704>:

And it shall be, that in the morning <WH1242>, as soon as the sun <WH8121> is up <WH2224> <WH8800>, thou shalt rise early <WH7925> <WH8686>, and set <WH6584> <WH8804> upon the city <WH5892>: and, behold, when he and the people <WH5971> that is with him come out <WH3318> <WH8802> against thee, then mayest thou do <WH6213> <WH8804> to them as thou <WH3027> shalt find occasion <WH4672> <WH8799>.

And Abimelech <WH40> rose up <WH6965> <WH8799>, and all the people <WH5971> that were with him, by night <WH3915>, and they laid wait <WH693> <WH8799> against SH'khem <WH7927> in four <WH702> companies <WH7218>.

And Gaal <WH1603> the son <WH1121> of Ebed <WH5651> went out <WH3318> <WH8799>, and stood <WH5975> <WH8799> in the entering <WH6607> of the gate <WH8179> of the city <WH5892>: and Abimelech <WH40> rose up <WH6965> <WH8799>, and the people <WH5971> that were with him, from lying in wait <WH3993>.

And when Gaal <WH1603> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the people <WH5971>, he said <WH559> <WH8799> to Zebul <WH2083>, Behold, there come <WH3381> people <WH5971> down <WH3381> <WH8802> from the top <WH7218> of the mountains <WH2022>. And Zebul <WH2083> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Thou seest <WH7200> <WH8802> the shadow <WH6738> of the mountains <WH2022> as if they were men <WH582>.

And Gaal <WH1603> spake <WH1696> <WH8763> again <WH3254> <WH8686> and said <WH559> <WH8799>, See there come <WH3381> people <WH5971> down <WH3381> <WH8802> by the middle <WH2872> of the land <WH776>, and another <WH259> company <WH7218> come <WH935> <WH8804> along by the plain <WH436> of <WH1870> Meonenim <WH6049> <WH8781>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> Zebul <WH2083> unto him, Where is now <WH645> thy mouth <WH6310>, wherewith thou saidst <WH559> <WH8799>, Who is Abimelech <WH40>, that we should serve <WH5647> <WH8799> him? is not this the people <WH5971> that thou hast despised <WH3988> <WH8804>? go out <WH3318> <WH8798>, I pray now <WH4994>, and fight <WH3898> <WH8734> with them.
And Gaal <WH1603> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the men <WH1167> of SH'khem <WH7927>, and fought <WH3898> <WH8735> with Abimelech <WH40>.

And Abimelech <WH40> chased <WH7291> <WH8799> him, and he fled <WH5127> <WH8799> before <WH6440> him, and many <WH7227> were overthrown <WH5307> <WH8799> and wounded <WH2491>, even unto the entering <WH6607> of the gate <WH8179>.

And Abimelech <WH40> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> at Arumah <WH725>: and Zebul <WH2083> thrust out <WH1644> <WH8762> Gaal <WH1603> and his brethren <WH251>, that they should not dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> in SH'khem <WH7927>.
And it came to pass on the morrow <WH4283>, that the people <WH5971> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> into the field <WH7704>; and they told <WH5046> <WH8686> Abimelech <WH40>.

And he took <WH3947> <WH8799> the people <WH5971>, and divided <WH2673> <WH8799> them into three <WH7969> companies <WH7218>, and laid wait <WH693> <WH8799> in the field <WH7704>, and looked <WH7200> <WH8799>, and, behold, the people <WH5971> were come forth <WH3318> <WH8802> out of the city <WH5892>; and he rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> against them, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them.

And Abimelech <WH40>, and the company <WH7218> that was with him, rushed forward <WH6584> <WH8804>, and stood <WH5975> <WH8799> in the entering <WH6607> of the gate <WH8179> of the city <WH5892>: and the two <WH8147> other companies <WH7218> ran upon <WH6584> <WH8804> all the people that were in the fields <WH7704>, and slew <WH5221> <WH8686> them.

And Abimelech <WH40> fought <WH3898> <WH8738> against the city <WH5892> all that day <WH3117>; and he took <WH3920> <WH8799> the city <WH5892>, and slew <WH2026> <WH8804> the people <WH5971> that was therein, and beat down <WH5422> <WH8799> the city <WH5892>, and sowed <WH2232> <WH8799> it with salt <WH4417>.

And when all the men <WH1167> of the tower <WH4026> of SH'khem <WH7927> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> that, they entered <WH935> <WH8799> into an hold <WH6877> of the house <WH1004> of the god <WH410> Berith <WH1286>.
And it was told <WH5046> <WH8714> Abimelech <WH40>, that all the men <WH1167> of the tower <WH4026> of SH'khem <WH7927> were gathered together <WH6908> <WH8694>.

And Abimelech <WH40> gat him up <WH5927> <WH8799> to mount <WH2022> Zalmon <WH6756>, he and all the people <WH5971> that were with him; and Abimelech <WH40> took <WH3947> <WH8799> an axe <WH7134> in his hand <WH3027>, and cut down <WH3772> <WH8799> a bough <WH7754> from the trees <WH6086>, and took <WH5375> <WH8799> it, and laid <WH7760> <WH8799> it on his shoulder <WH7926>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the people <WH5971> that were with him, What ye have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> me do <WH6213> <WH8804>, make haste <WH4116> <WH8761>, and do <WH6213> <WH8798> as I <WH3644> have done.

And all the people <WH5971> likewise cut down <WH3772> <WH8799> every man <WH376> his bough <WH7754>, and followed <WH3212> <WH8799> <WH310> Abimelech <WH40>, and put <WH7760> <WH8799> them to the hold <WH6877>, and set <WH3341> <WH8686> the hold <WH6877> on fire <WH784> upon them; so that all the men <WH582> of the tower <WH4026> of SH'khem <WH7927> died <WH4191> <WH8799> also, about a thousand <WH505> men <WH376> and women <WH802>.
Then went <WH3212> <WH8799> Abimelech <WH40> to Thebez <WH8405>, and encamped <WH2583> <WH8799> against Thebez <WH8405>, and took <WH3920> <WH8799> it.

But there was a strong <WH5797> tower <WH4026> within <WH8432> the city <WH5892>, and thither fled <WH5127> <WH8799> all the men <WH582> and women <WH802>, and all they <WH1167> of the city <WH5892>, and shut <WH5462> <WH8799> it to them, and gat them up <WH5927> <WH8799> to the top <WH1406> of the tower <WH4026>.

And Abimelech <WH40> came <WH935> <WH8799> unto the tower <WH4026>, and fought <WH3898> <WH8735> against it, and went hard <WH5066> <WH8799> unto the door <WH6607> of the tower <WH4026> to burn <WH8313> <WH8800> it with fire <WH784>.
And a certain <WH259> woman <WH802> cast <WH7993> <WH8686> a piece <WH6400> of a millstone <WH7393> upon Abimelech's <WH40> head <WH7218>, and all to brake <WH7533> <WH8686> his skull <WH1538>.

Then he called <WH7121> <WH8799> hastily <WH4120> unto the young man <WH5288> his armourbearer <WH5375> <WH8802> <WH3627>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Draw <WH8025> <WH8798> thy sword <WH2719>, and slay <WH4191> <WH8786> me, that men say <WH559> <WH8799> not of me, A woman <WH802> slew <WH2026> <WH8804> him. And his young man <WH5288> thrust him through <WH1856> <WH8799>, and he died <WH4191> <WH8799>.
And when the men <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that Abimelech <WH40> was dead <WH4191> <WH8804>, they departed <WH3212> <WH8799> every man <WH376> unto his place <WH4725>.

Thus 'Elohim <WH430> rendered <WH7725> <WH8686> the wickedness <WH7451> of Abimelech <WH40>, which he did <WH6213> <WH8804> unto his father <WH1>, in slaying <WH2026> <WH8800> his seventy <WH7657> brethren <WH251>:

And all the evil <WH7451> of the men <WH582> of SH'khem <WH7927> did 'Elohim <WH430> render <WH7725> <WH8689> upon their heads <WH7218>: and upon them came <WH935> <WH8799> the curse <WH7045> of Yotam <WH3147> the son <WH1121> of Yeruba`al <WH3378>.
